INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_LOCTN_STK_TXN_DTL (LOCTN_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, CMPNY_CDE, STK_TXN_ID, TXN_TYP_ID, TXN_TYP_ACTN_CDE, TXN_REF_NUM, INSTR_ID, INSTCL_ID, INSTCL_VID, MRKT_ID, VAL_DATE, INPT_DATE, MRKT_BUSDATE, STK_CHNL_CDE, STK_QTY, REMRK, IS_AUTO_APRV, IS_MEMO, IS_TRNFR, IS_REV, IS_SHOW_IN_STMT, IS_TODAY_REV, REV_LOCTN_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, IS_IGNR_DAT_SYNC, STK_LOCTN_ID, SLEDG_ID, STK_STAT_CDE, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.loctnStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.txnTypId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.txnTypActnCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.txnRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.instrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.instclId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.instclVid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.mrktId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.valDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.inptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.mrktBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.stkChnlCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stkQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAutoAprv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isTrnfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isShowInStmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isTodayRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.revLoctnStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isIgnrDatSync,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stkLoctnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.sledgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stkStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
